summary: Provides a lightweight Payjoin server setup for test environments, initializing a single JoinMarket wallet on regtest, configuring SSL certificates, and optionally exposing the service via a Tor onion endpoint, with helper utilities for server startup and status reporting.
business_intent: Enable developers and QA teams to run automated integration tests of the Payjoin protocol by supplying a ready‑to‑use server instance that mimics real‑world transaction handling without requiring full production infrastructure.
